long_desc.thetext: Description of problem: This is a tracking bug for Change: Darktable 2.0 For more details, see: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Changes/Darktable_2_0

darktable 2.0 has been released [1] You can find a RPM package and spec file at [2]
[1]: https://copr.fedoraproject.org/coprs/germano/Darktable_2.0_release_candidate/builds/ [2]: https://copr.fedoraproject.org/coprs/germano/Darktable_2.0_release_candidate/builds/
You can check the .spec file at https://fedorapeople.org/~germano/darktable.spec
Are there plans to upgrade 23 users to version 2.0.xxxx of Darktable ?

(In reply to Ludovic Hirlimann from comment #4) > Are there plans to upgrade 23 users to version 2.0.xxxx of Darktable ?
Not officially. You can enable my Copr repository https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/germano/Darktable_2.0_release_candidate/

On 2016-Feb-23, we have reached Fedora 24 Change Checkpoint: Completion deadline (testable).
At this point, all accepted changes should be substantially complete, and testable. Additionally, if a change is to be enabled by default, it must be so enabled at Change Completion deadline.
Change tracking bug should be set to the MODIFIED state to indicate it achieved completeness.
Incomplete and non testable Changes will be reported to FESCo on 2016-Feb-26 meeting. Contingency plan for System Wide Changes, if planned for Alpha (or in case of serious doubts regarding Change completion), will be activated.

On 2016-Apr-19 we reached the "Change Checkpoint: 100% Code Complete Deadline" milestone for Fedora 24 release. At this point all the Changes not at least in in "ON_QA" state should be brought to FESCo for review. Please update the state of this bug to "ON_QA" if it is already 100% completed. Please let me know in case you have any trouble with the implementation and the Change needs any help or review.
Thanks, Jan

I have added release notes text (mainly taken from the change description and darktable website) to the draft F24 Release Notes here: https://git.fedorahosted.org/cgit/docs/release-notes.git/plain/en-US/Graphics_Editors.xml?h=f24
Please would you take a look at the draft and let me know if anything should be added or changed?

(In reply to Simon Clark from comment #8) > I have added release notes text (mainly taken from the change description > and darktable website) to the draft F24 Release Notes here: > https://git.fedorahosted.org/cgit/docs/release-notes.git/plain/en-US/ > Graphics_Editors.xml?h=f24 > > Please would you take a look at the draft and let me know if anything should > be added or changed?
It seems okay to me. Thank you very much
darktable-2.0.4-1 went stable. I forgot to add this bugreport into the bodhi update https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-7ada104630 So I am closing it manually
